channel.title: Lock items
channel.description:
How can i lock items
I got spawn server (317 PI)
i want to lock d claws , vesta , torva and that all rare stuff i want it only in the shops can someone help me i repp++

item.title: Lock items
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Declare this,

Add this to your item command

if(itemId == unspawnableitem || itemId == anotheritemandsoon){ unspawnable = true; }

also add this

if(unspawnable) unspawnable = false; return false;

Work out the rest yourself!

Read full topic

item.title: Lock items
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

well im not too shure with 317 but if u a good coder u could search up the opcodes of weild/wear which i believe is like 39 then u go to like the .java where it handles what happend when a item is clicked and write an if statement so unless your a donor u can wear it

Read full topic
